Source.name: EBS Sensor: MFG PO Ship to org id in shipments not equal to Destination org id in distributions - Daily
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: MFG PO Ship to org id in shipments not equal to Destination org id in distributions - Daily
Source.Description: There is data corruption where Purchase Orders have the Ship to org id in shipments table not equal to Destination org id in distributions table.

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_MFG_PO_AUTOCREATE_SHIP_ORG_DESTINATION_ORG' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'header_id:' || s.header_id || ', distribution_id:' || s.distribution_id || ', line_location_id:' || s.line_location_id || ', destination_org_id:' || s.destination_org_id || ', ship_to_org_id:' || s.ship_to_org_id key_data FROM (select pod.po_header_id header_id, pod.po_distribution_id distribution_id, pod.line_location_id line_location_id, pod.destination_organization_id destination_org_id, poll.ship_to_organization_id ship_to_org_id from apps.po_distributions_all pod,apps.po_line_locations_all poll where pod.line_location_id = poll.line_location_id and pod.po_header_id = poll.po_header_id and pod.destination_organization_id != poll.ship_to_organization_id and nvl(poll.closed_code,'OPEN') != 'FINALLY CLOSED' and nvl(poll.cancel_flag,'N') != 'Y' and nvl(poll.quantity_received,0) = 0 and rownum < 1000 order by pod.po_header_id desc) s
